Name: Population Size
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the number of samples to evaluate per generation (preferably $4+3*log(N)$, where $N$ is the number of variables).

Name: Mu Value
Configuration Settings.Description: Number of best samples used to update the covariance matrix and the mean (by default it is half the Sample Count).

Name: Mu Type
Configuration Settings.Description: Weights given to the Mu best values to update the covariance matrix and the mean.

Name: Initial Sigma
Configuration Settings.Description: Initial scaling factor for sample distribution.

Name: Sigma Cumulation Factor
Configuration Settings.Description: Controls the learning rate of the conjugate evolution path (must be in (0,1]).

Name: Damp Factor
Configuration Settings.Description: Controls the updates of the covariance matrix scaling factor (must be in (0,1]).

Name: Is Sigma Bounded
Configuration Settings.Description: Sets an upper bound for the covariance matrix scaling factor. The upper bound is given by the average of the initial standard deviation of the variables.

Name: Cumulative Covariance
Configuration Settings.Description: Controls the learning rate of the evolution path for the covariance update (must be in (0,1]).

Name: Cholesky Matrix Learning Rate
Configuration Settings.Description: Controls the learning rate of the Cholesky factor (must be in (0,1]).

Name: Target Distance Coefficients
Configuration Settings.Description: Coefficients that define target distance between consecutive vectors in Evolution Path Matrix. Target distance calculated as a0 + a1 * ( (j+1)/Subset Size)^a2, where j corresponds to the jth oldest Evolution Path. By default target distance equals N.

Name: Target Success Rate
Configuration Settings.Description: Target population success rate. Sigma increases if population success rate is larger than target. Success rate estimated from comparison of previous and current function values.

Name: Set Update Interval
Configuration Settings.Description: Intervals at which the Evolution Path Matrix and the Inverse Vectors are being updated.

Name: Subset Size
Configuration Settings.Description: Number of vectors used to reconstruct the Cholesky factor (old version uses 4+3log(N)). Larger Subset Size increases internal cost but usually improves performance.

Name: Min Value
Termination Criteria.Description: Specifies the minimum target fitness to stop minimization.

Name: Max Value
Termination Criteria.Description: Specifies the maximum target fitness to stop maximization.

Name: Min Value Difference Threshold
Termination Criteria.Description: Specifies the minimum fitness differential between two consecutive generations before stopping execution.

Name: Initial Mean
Variables Configuration.Description: Defines the initial mean for the proposal distribution. This value must be defined between the variable's Mininum and Maximum settings (by default, this value is given by the center of the variable domain).

Name: Initial Standard Deviation
Variables Configuration.Description: Defines the initial standard deviation of the proposal distribution for a variable (by default, this value is given by 30% of the variable domain width).

Name: Minimum Standard Deviation Update
Variables Configuration.Description: Defines a lower bound for the standard deviation updates of the proposal distribution for a variable. Korali increases the scaling factor $\sigma$ if this value is undershot.

Name: Value Vector
Internal Settings.Description: Objective function values.

Name: Previous Value Vector
Internal Settings.Description: Objective function values from previous generation.

Name: Mu Weights
Internal Settings.Description: Weights for each of the Mu samples.

Name: Effective Mu
Internal Settings.Description: Variance effective selection mass.

Name: Subset Start Index
Internal Settings.Description: Current first vector index to reconstruct the Cholesky factor.

Name: Sigma Exponent Factor
Internal Settings.Description: Controls step size increment.

Name: Sigma
Internal Settings.Description: Determines the step size. Initialized by the larger value of either Initial Sigma or 30% of the domain size (averaged over all dimensions).

Name: Sample Population
Internal Settings.Description: Sample coordinate information.

Name: Finished Sample Count
Internal Settings.Description: Counter of evaluated samples to terminate evaluation.

Name: Current Best Value
Internal Settings.Description: Best model evaluation from current generation.

Name: Current Best Variables
Internal Settings.Description: Best variables of current generation.

Name: Best Ever Variables
Internal Settings.Description: Best ever found variables.

Name: Previous Best Value
Internal Settings.Description: Best model evaluation from previous generation.

Name: Best Sample Index
Internal Settings.Description: Index of the best sample in current generation.

Name: Best Ever Value
Internal Settings.Description: Best ever model evaluation.

Name: Previous Best Ever Value
Internal Settings.Description: Best ever model evaluation as of previous generation.

Name: Previous Sorting Index
Internal Settings.Description: Sorted indeces of samples of previous generation according to their model evaluation.

Name: Sorting Index
Internal Settings.Description: Sorted indeces of samples according to their model evaluation.

Name: Random Vector
Internal Settings.Description: Vector storing random numbers for sample generation.

Name: Replacement Index
Internal Settings.Description: Current column to replace in Evolution Path Matrix and Inverse Vectors.

Name: Subset History
Internal Settings.Description: Historical column updates of Evolution Path Matrix.

Name: Subset Update Times
Internal Settings.Description: Stores timestamps of updated columns in Evolution Path Matrix.

Name: Cholesky Factor Vector Product
Internal Settings.Description: Placeholder for Cholesky Factor product with Random Vector.

Name: Evolution Path Matrix
Internal Settings.Description: Matrix storing evolution paths in columns.

Name: Inverse Vectors
Internal Settings.Description: Matrix storing the inverse vectors.

Name: Current Mean
Internal Settings.Description: Current mean of proposal distribution.

Name: Previous Mean
Internal Settings.Description: Previous mean of proposal distribution.

Name: Mean Update
Internal Settings.Description: Update differential from previous to current mean.

Name: Evolution Path
Internal Settings.Description: Evolution path for Covariance Matrix update.

Name: Evolution Path Weights
Internal Settings.Description: Weights for the calculation of the Cholesky Factor.

Name: Conjugate Evolution Path L2 Norm
Internal Settings.Description: L2 Norm of the conjugate evolution path.

Name: Infeasible Sample Count
Internal Settings.Description: Keeps count of the number of infeasible samples.

Name: Sqrt Inverse Cholesky Rate
Internal Settings.Description: Shared variable to speed up computation.
